name: BUY IT -Jam game
description:
Fight through hordes of enemies, buy features of the game to improve it, and complete it by buying everything!

In this game, you start with very few things, literally, and must keep playing to get money, upgrade things in the game, until you finish upgrading everything, after that, you can finish the game by defeating a final boss

I created this game for the 36th GMC Jam, however, I didn't make it to the deadline, but I still put a lot of effort in it, so I posted it here. Hope you enjoy it!
